edu.trident.hilliard.finalassignment

Class RentedTaxi

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.trident.hilliard.finalassignment.Taxi
      • edu.trident.hilliard.finalassignment.RentedTaxi

  • public class RentedTaxi
extends Taxi
    RentedTaxi extends Taxi with operating costs such as servicing and gas. Tracks miles driven since last service.

    Variables:
    cabName - name of cab
    serviceMileage - distance cab has travelled since last service
    operatingCost - service cost and gas cost total
    Author:
    Noah Hilliard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RentedTaxi(double gasAmount)
      Constructor that accepts a gasAmount and limits it to the GAS_CAPACITY of the Taxi.
      RentedTaxi(java.lang.String cab)
      Constructor that creates a new cab with a full tank of gas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGasCost(double gallons, double price)
      Adds the cost of gas added to operating costs, if the value entered exceeds the amount that can be put into the tank, the amount is reduced to only fill the tank.
      void addRentedTrip(double tripMiles)
      Checks for maintenance needed or admin override and updates serviceMileage with tripMiles and calls Taxi.addTrip(double) from super.
      double getOperatingCost()
      Provides the accrued operating cost.
      double getServiceMileage()
      Provides the miles driven since the last time the taxi was serviced.
      void resetRentedTaxi()
      Resets the taxi by calling resetTaxi from super and setting operatingCost to 0.0
      void serviceTaxi(double serviceCost)
      Services the cab, resets the serviceMileage to 0.0 and adds 12 to the operating cost.

      • Methods inherited from class edu.trident.hilliard.finalassignment.Taxi

        addFare, addGas, addMileage, addTrip, calculateFare, getCurrentGas, getCurrentMileage, getTotalFare, milesAvailable, resetTaxi, useGas

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceMileage

        public double getServiceMileage()
        Provides the miles driven since the last time the taxi was serviced.
        Returns:
        serviceMileage miles driven since last service

      • getOperatingCost

        public double getOperatingCost()
        Provides the accrued operating cost.
        Returns:
        operatingCost

      • serviceTaxi

        public void serviceTaxi(double serviceCost)
        Services the cab, resets the serviceMileage to 0.0 and adds 12 to the operating cost.
        Parameters:
        serviceCost - charge for servicing the cab

      • addGasCost

        public void addGasCost(double gallons,
                       double price)
        Adds the cost of gas added to operating costs, if the value entered exceeds the amount that can be put into the tank, the amount is reduced to only fill the tank.
        Parameters:
        gallons - number of gallons
        price - cost of each gallon

      • resetRentedTaxi

        public void resetRentedTaxi()
        Resets the taxi by calling resetTaxi from super and setting operatingCost to 0.0

      • addRentedTrip

        public void addRentedTrip(double tripMiles)
        Checks for maintenance needed or admin override and updates serviceMileage with tripMiles and calls Taxi.addTrip(double) from super. If serviceMileage is 500 or higher it will notify all listeners and set the maintenanceNeeded boolean to true.
        Parameters:
        tripMiles - distance of the entered fare
